attributes.action: Give British families priority in social housing, not migrant workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British people have worked and paid tax and national insurence all their lives and yet their children can not get council or housing association housing without an exceptionally long wait. Migrant workers come to this country without paying into the UK system and yet they are often given housing over our own people. This should stop, if migrants want to come and work here then they should have to find their own solution to housing and not rely on the state to provide for them.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Give British families priority in social housing, not migrant workers."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13234.asp

Prime Minister's Office
